text: <@U6W3H6YN8>, any HubSpot-cli commands on the ability to clone a complete COS portal including all templates/modules/files/webpages/blogs/hubdbs/content settings/advanced menu, into another portal, using Local Dev

Hey Chris!

We do have near term plans to support downloading all of your Design Manager assets at once (compared to each root folder at a time).

Previewing with all of your portal context is a larger problem we are thinking about. We are working on integrating the local HubL server into the CMS CLI which might solve some of your needs <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1564763002059500>. No definite timeframe this, but it is something we are actively thinking about.
ok sounds good, I will look at this link, thank you!!!
